text: Create a humorous and casual scene featuring a green frog sporting a pair of swimming goggles. The setting is a human-like environment: the frog is in a fully furnished modern kitchen, trying to flip some pancakes with a spatula in its little webbed hands. A couple of kitchen utensils are scattered around and thereâ€™s a stack of pancakes on a plate beside it. Some sunlight is trickling into the room through an open window, casting shining patterns on the tiled floor.
